value.title: Google’s deep learning finds a critical path in AI chips
value.excerpt: ZDNet spoke with Google Brain director Jeff Dean about how the company is using artificial intelligence to advance its internal development of custom chips to accelerate its software. Dean noted that deep learning forms of artificial intelligence can in some cases make better decisions than humans about how to lay out circuitry in a chip.

value.title: The Deep South Has a Rich History of Resistance, as Amazon Is Learning
value.excerpt: The Deep South is not generally known for its labor agitation, which is why it might come as a surprise for some to learn that it is in Alabama where workers have mounted one of the largest and most aggressive efforts to unionize Amazon in recent memory.

value.title: Eight Things Machine Learning Can Do To Improve Your Daily Customer Interactions
value.excerpt: Below, eight leaders from Young Entrepreneur Council attempt to quell some of those fears by discussing the merits of machine learning and how they see it affecting their own daily interactions with customers.

value.title: Why machine learning strategies fail
value.excerpt: Most companies are still trying to figure out how to make AI work. A recent survey looks at some of the barriers to machine learning.

value.title: Deep learning market is expected to grow at a CAGR of around 51.1% over the forecast period 2019 to 2026
value.excerpt: The global deep learning market is expected to grow at a CAGR of around 51.1% over the forecast period 2019 to 2026 and reach the market value of over US$ 56,427.2 million by 2026. North America held the major share of the global deep learning market in 2018.

value.title: Featurespace Touts Breakthrough In Machine Learning For Anti-Fraud Systems
value.excerpt: Featurespace said its new product for the payments industry provides a “deeper layer of defense to protect consumers from scams, account takeover" and fraud.

value.title: Way of using machine learning to aid mental health diagnoses developed
value.excerpt: A team of researchers at the University of Birmingham have developed a way of using machine learning to more accurately identify patients with a mix of psychotic and depressive symptoms. The findings of the research ' Bulletin'.

value.title: Machine learning aids in simulating dynamics of interacting atoms
value.excerpt: A revolutionary machine-learning (ML) approach to simulate the motions of atoms in materials such as aluminum is described in this week's Nature Communications journal. This automated approach to "interatomic potential development" could transform the field of computational materials discovery.

value.title: Bank machine learning models hit hard by Covid
value.excerpt: Over a third of UK banks have reported a negative impact on the performance of mcahine learning models as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.

value.title: Thomson Reuters to stress AI, machine learning in a post-pandemic world
value.excerpt: Thomson Reuters Corp will streamline technology, close offices and rely more on machines to prepare for a post-pandemic world, the news and information group said on Tuesday, as it reported higher sales and operating profit.

value.title: Proposed framework could reduce energy consumption of federated learning
value.excerpt: In a new paper, AI and machine learning researchers propose a federated learning framework desgined to minimize environmental impact.

value.title: NAG Delivers Machine Learning Guidance via New Azure HPC + AI Collaboration Centre
value.excerpt: The Numerical Algorithms Group (NAG) will provide machine learning guidance to Microsoft Azure users via the new Azure HPC & AI Collaboration Centre. In partnership with NVIDIA, this new centre will develop best practices for the deployment of scalable machine learning in the Cloud.

value.title: Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) Is Hot In AI, But Getting A Cooler Reception For Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: To some degree that is the goal of Automated Machine Learning, known as AutoML, which consists of an automated means to build on your behalf a Machine Learning application, requiring minimal by-hand effort on your part.

value.title: How reinforcement learning chooses the ads you see
value.excerpt: RL models seek to maximize rewards. In the case of online ads, the model will try to find the ad that users are more likely to click on.
